thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com | 2 of 25
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: Called for pricing and when I later called back to reserve was Quote: d a different price. Simply said something about the new Quote: and it was fixed. Staff called while we were on the way to the cabin to ask if we had made it yet and to let us know that it was ready. Cabin was beautiful and mostly clean. Check out was simple and easy. If you plan on cooking while you are in one of the cabins make sure you bring some hand sanitizer or soap and some good knives.
